document.title: To search for images on the web, look at the text, then look at the images
document.abstract: The World Wide Web can be viewed many different ways. It is simultaneously a giant library, a world-encompassing read-mostly file system, a novel means of expression, and an incredible business
document.venue: In Proceedings of the First International Workshop on Web Document Analysis (WDA2001), online at http://www.csc.liv.ac.uk/ wda2001

author.name: Ethan V. Munson
author.affil: Department of EECS; University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee

citation.title: Accessing textual information embedded in internet images
citation.venue: In Proceedings of Electronic Imaging 2001: Internet Imaging II
citation.raw: A. Antonacopoulos, D. Karatzas, and J. O. Lopez. Accessing textual information embedded in internet images. In Proceedings of Electronic Imaging 2001: Internet Imaging II, San Jose, California USA. SPIE, Jan. 2001.

citation.authors: M G Brown,J T Foote,G J F Jones,K S Jones,S J Young
citation.title: Automatic content-based retrieval of broadcast news

citation.authors: M G Brown,J T Foote,G J F Jones,K S Jones,S J Young
citation.title: Open-vocabulary speech indexing for voice and video mail retrieval
citation.raw: M. G. Brown, J. T. Foote, G. J. F. Jones, K. S. Jones, and S. J. Young. Open-vocabulary speech indexing for voice and video mail retrieval. In Proceedings ACM Multimedia ’96, pages 307–316. ACM Press, Nov. 1996.

citation.authors: M Flickner,H Sawhney,W Niblack,J Ashley,Q Huang,B Dom,M Gorkani,J Hafner,D Lee,D Petkovic,D Steele,P Yanker
citation.title: Query by image and video content: the QBIC system

citation.title: WebSeer: An image search engine for the World Wide Web
citation.raw: C. Frankel, M. Swain, and V. Athitsos. WebSeer: An image search engine for the World Wide Web. Technical Report 96-14, University of Chicago, Department of Computer Science, July 1996.

citation.title: Locating and recognizing text in WWW images
citation.raw: D. P. Lopresti and J. Zhou. Locating and recognizing text in WWW images. Information Retrieval, 2(2/3):177–206, May 2000.

citation.title: Visually searching the Web for content
citation.raw: J. Smith and S. F. Chang. Visually searching the Web for content. IEEE Multimedia, 4(3):12–20, JulySeptember 1997.

citation.raw: Y. Tsymbalenko and E. V. Munson. Using HTML metadata to find relevant images on the Web. In Proceedings of Internet Computing 2001, Volume II, Las Vegas, pages 842–848.
